mapper.select: select pl.product_name as "productName", B.bom_no as "bomNo", RM.rm_no as "rmNo", RM.rm_name as "rmName", br.quantity as "requiredQ", R.quantity as "rmStock" from product_list PL left join bom B on PL.pl_no = B.pl_no left join bom_rm BR on B.bom_no = BR.bom_no left join receiving R on BR.rm_no = R.rm_no left join raw_material RM on R.rm_no = RM.rm_no where PL.pl_no = 8
